data: The note titled API Rate Limiting Spec documents an API rate limiting policy that enforces a limit of 100 requests per minute per user.
The note titled API Rate Limiting Spec specifies that the API should return an HTTP 429 status code when a user exceeds the rate limit.
The note titled API Rate Limiting Spec identifies the /v1/users and /v1/orders endpoints as subjects of the rate limiting policy.
The note titled API Rate Limiting Spec recommends implementing middleware to enforce rate limiting in the API.
The note titled API Rate Limiting Spec includes an action item to write unit tests to validate the rate limiting functionality.
The note titled API Rate Limiting Spec includes a follow-up action to conduct load testing on the staging environment.
